result.orig: Níl sé ró-olc
result.html: Níl sé ró-olcIt's not too bad.
result.ponchtml: Níl sé ró-olcIt's not too bad.

result.eng: I have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ga: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.orig: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.html: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon údar agamsa lena ċeapaḋ naċ raiḃ aiṫne acu ar a ċéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.

result.eng: No imagination at all is needed to understand this.
result.ga: Níl samhlaíocht ar bith ag teastáil chun é seo a thuiscint
result.orig: Níl samhlaíocht ar bith ag teastáil chun é seo a thuiscint
result.html: Níl samhlaíocht ar bith ag teastáil chun é seo a thuiscintNo imagination at all is needed to understand this.
result.ponchtml: Níl saṁlaíoċt ar biṫ ag teastáil ċun é seo a ṫuiscintNo imagination at all is needed to understand this.

result.eng: They only live a couple of miles away from me.
result.ga: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimse
result.orig: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimse
result.html: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimseThey only live a couple of miles away from me.
result.ponchtml: Níl siad ina gcónaí aċ cúpla míle uaimseThey only live a couple of miles away from me.

result.eng: According to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
result.ga: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé
result.orig: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla sé
result.html: Dar leis an ollamh níl sé soiléir in aon chor cén fáth ar tharla séAccording to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis an ollaṁ níl sé soiléir in aon ċor cén fáṫ ar ṫarla séAccording to the professor, it is not at all clear why it happened.

result.eng: There's no way you'll get proper monetary reward for that.
result.ga: Níl luach saothair ar bith le baint as
result.orig: Níl luach saothair ar bith le baint as
result.html: Níl luach saothair ar bith le baint asThere's no way you'll get proper monetary reward for that.
result.ponchtml: Níl luaċ saoṫair ar biṫ le baint asThere's no way you'll get proper monetary reward for that.

result.eng: Twitter is basically just text messages for the Internet.
result.ga: Níl i Twitter go bunúsach ach teachtaireachtaí téacs don idirlíon
result.orig: Níl i Twitter go bunúsach ach teachtaireachtaí téacs don idirlíon
result.html: Níl i Twitter go bunúsach ach teachtaireachtaí téacs don idirlíonTwitter is basically just text messages for the Internet.
result.ponchtml: Níl i Twitter go bunúsaċ aċ teaċtaireaċtaí téacs don idirlíonTwitter is basically just text messages for the Internet.

result.eng: I have no idea what happened.
result.ga: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharla
result.orig: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharla
result.html: Níl a fhios agam beo cad a tharlaI have no idea what happened.
result.ponchtml: Níl a ḟios agam beo cad a ṫarlaI have no idea what happened.

result.eng: She is tiny and weighs nothing.
result.ga: Níl méid nó meáchan inti
result.orig: Níl méid nó meáchan inti
result.html: Níl méid nó meáchan intiShe is tiny and weighs nothing.
result.ponchtml: Níl méid nó meáċan intiShe is tiny and weighs nothing.

result.eng: You are impossible to please.
result.ga: Níl sásamh le déanamh oraibh
result.orig: Níl sásamh le déanamh oraibh
result.html: Níl sásamh le déanamh oraibhYou are impossible to please.
result.ponchtml: Níl sásaṁ le déanaṁ oraiḃYou are impossible to please.

result.eng: You can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ga: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh
result.orig: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh
result.html: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbhYou can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ponchtml: Tá Babaí inleiṫscéil go fóill nó níl inti aċ luspairt linḃYou can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.

result.eng: There is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.
result.ga: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinín
result.orig: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinín
result.html: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinínThere is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.
result.ponchtml: Níl dada le gnóṫú ar a ḃeiṫ easuṁal don té a ḃfuil tú ina ṁuinínThere is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.

result.eng: I don't know what I'd do without you.
result.ga: Níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thú
result.orig: Níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thú
result.html: Níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thúI don't know what I'd do without you.
result.ponchtml: Níl a ḟios agam goidé a ḋéanfainn aċ go bé ṫúI don't know what I'd do without you.

result.eng: They haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.orig: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.html: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair siad aon ġreim le níl a ḟios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.

result.eng: There's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ga: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.orig: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.html: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ponchtml: Níl contúirt ort dearmad a ḋéanaṁ díom nuair a ḃeas mé ar ẛiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?

result.eng: There is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ga: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.orig: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.html: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaíThere is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ponchtml: Níl léaṁ nó scríoḃ nó inse béil ar an ġrá a ṫug mise don ċailín udaíThere is no describing the love I had for that girl.

result.eng: He cannot be cured.
result.ga: Níl sé inleighis
result.orig: Níl sé inleighis
result.html: Níl sé inleighisHe cannot be cured.
result.ponchtml: Níl sé inleiġisHe cannot be cured.

result.eng: There's no point saying anything.
result.ga: Níl gar a bheith ag caint
result.orig: Níl gar a bheith ag caint
result.html: Níl gar a bheith ag caintThere's no point saying anything.
result.ponchtml: Níl gar a ḃeiṫ ag caintThere's no point saying anything.

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ga: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.html: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ponchtml: Níl feiḋm orm aon lá oibre a ḋéanaṁ le mo ẛolas Tá mé i mo ẛáiṫ den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
